isb:document.p: This document contains the version history for the &appName; software product.

tr.td: Fixed a bug in the Gibson-Bruck simulator, for the case of a boundary reactant species. Fixed a bug in the command-language parser, it can now accept tabs as valid whitespace in the model definition file. The SBML import feature can now process model definition files that conform to the SBML Level 1, Version 2 specification. Fixed a bug in which &appName; would fail to start, in the case where &appName; was installed in the top-level directory of a Windows (or DOS) drive.
Modified the Cytoscape bridge to use JNLP, so Cytoscape does not have to be bundled with Dizzy
Added the ability to simulate a multistep chemical reaction as a single composite reaction
Added the ability to display a model in a Cytoscape window.
First version of the program. It is an alpha version, intended only for internal use at &mainAffiliation;.
